components.calculateValue:
const opts = [
  { label: 63, value: 17 },
  { label: 64, value: 12.7 },
  { label: 65, value: 9.3 },
  { label: 66, value: 6.8 },
  { label: 67, value: 5 },
  { label: 68, value: 3.7 },

  { label: 72, value: 1 },
  { label: 73, value: 0.8 },
  { label: 74, value: 0.6 },
  { label: 75, value: 0.4 },
  { label: 76, value: 0.3 },
  { label: 77, value: 0.2 },
  { label: 78, value: 0.2 },
  { label: 79, value: 0.1 },
  { label: 80, value: 0.09 },
  { label: 81, value: 0.07 },
  { label: 82, value: 0.05 },
  { label: 83, value: 0.03 },
  { label: 84, value: 0.03 },
  { label: 85, value: 0.02 },
]

const opt = opts.find(opt => opt.label === Number(data.internalProductTemperature))
value = opt.value ? opt.value : ''

components.label: HTML
components.content: Chill Time Passed
components.customConditional: show = (show = data.cook === 'Sous Vide' || data.cook === '6D Process (Listeria)' || data.cook === '6D Process (Clostridium)') && data.time1.timePassed

components.label: HTML
components.content: Chill Time Remaining
components.customConditional: show = (show = data.cook === 'Sous Vide' || data.cook === '6D Process (Listeria)' || data.cook === '6D Process (Clostridium)') && data.time1.timeRemaining
